name: Ghoulette Elle
description:
Ghoulette Elle is a 2 week long rapid prototype project, round 2, cohort 19 of FIEA:

by

Bailee Blaylock

Kyra Eddy

Jamie LaRose

Ashley Quebedeaux

Gabi Tristani

Maximize screen to play from web! 

WASD - move, Mouse - camera, step behind gravestone - crouch/hide, spacebar - shoot, WASD+right mouse - dash, ESC - menu

Thank you for checking it out!
